replies.msg:
So glad you guys opened up a section for English language, I’ve always read and heard a lot about LIHKG but the language barrier always kept me back from interacting with the community here.

I’m a native English speaker and I’m offering to refine any English text be it for your assignments or protest materials.

I strongly support the pro-democracy movement in HK and have attended some protests myself. I’ll do whatever I can to help.

香港人反抗

thank you so much!!
and a lot of HKers here will be trying to do translation on posts.
So, here is to all of us, working together for the same cause.
I can also help.

replies.msg: Absolutely! I have friends and family in my home country also rooting for the protestors, I’ll be sure to share this with them so they can get the full picture.
I go to school by bus
Thank you for your support
Let’s get some people in here who are learning English and help them out!
